adjectives.description: figured (comparative more figured, superlative most figured)

entries.meaning: (of a natural material) Having a pattern considered attractive appearing on a section.
examples: Figured wood is especially sought after for its distinctive texture.

entries.meaning: Adorned with a figure or figures.
examples: Some of these mosaics have been carefully altered to replaced figured by non-figured designs.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of figure
